data.strFullDescription:
[p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/539470/extras/ezgif-3-8e8f2aa67bd4.gif?t=1729094214[/img]
[/p][p]Inspired by SWAT 4 and gritty police TV shows, Police Stories is a fresh take on top-down shooters with an emphasis on tactics that forces you to make split second decisions. Neutralize criminals, rescue civilians and defuse bombs in Single Player mode or Online Co-op. And remember - shooting first is not an option!
[/p][p]
[/p][p]Unforgiving and tense, each mission tells a story of two police operatives - John Rimes and Rick Jones, filled with infiltrating gang hideouts, rescuing hostages, making arrests and other life-threatening situations.
[/p][p]
[/p][p][img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/539470/extras/smallcutscenes.gif?t=1729094214[/img]
[/p][list][*][p][b]The Surrender System[/b] [b]allows[/b] you to apprehend the suspects without resorting to violence. Fire a warning shot near them or engage them in melee combat - those are just some of the ways you can make them submit.
[/p][/*][*][p][b]Issue commands[/b] to your fellow cop Rick Jones. Make sure to use him wisely - and who knows, he might save your life in return. 
[/p][/*][*][p][b]Randomly placed criminals, hostages and evidence[/b] make every level run unique. The placement changes every time you restart, leading to new interesting situations and opportunities.
[/p][/*][*][p]As a law enforcement officer, you will have access to [b]end-of-the-line police equipment[/b], such as under-the-door cameras, door blast charges and many others.
[/p][/*][*][p][b]Various types of lawbreakers[/b], from small petty criminals to well organised gangs and terrorists. Each type has not only unique weapons, but different behaviour and shooting skill.
[/p][/*][*][p][b]Complex Tactical Gameplay:[/b] Try not to get spotted, don't waste bullets, regularly check your surroundings and make sure to take criminals down quietly.
[/p][/*][*][p]All your actions are [b]scored in real time[/b]. Playing aggressively won't get you a high enough result to start the next mission - so keep that in mind!
[/p][/*][*][p][b]Co-op.[/b] Complete mission together for better scores and more fun! 
[/p][/*][/list][p]
[/p][p]
[/p]
